list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a form of team game played in North America with an oval ball on a field marked out as a gridiron.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a ball used in football, either oval (as in American football) or round (as in soccer), typically made of leather or plastic and filled with compressed air.
a briefcase containing authentication codes and other items that allow the US president to authorize a nuclear strike at any time.
